product_name: Hi-Tec Oakhurst Waterproof Hiking Boots - Kids' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Kids can go from family hikes in the woods to playing in the park with ease in the Hi-Tec Oakhurst Waterproof Hiking Boots. Real nubuck leather keeps puddles out and toe bumpers add protection. Waterproof full-grain nubuck uppers with mesh lining keep feet dry. Sockliner system increases the lifespan of the boots. Padded tongue and collar. Steel shanks and lightweight EVA midsoles flex and support. Rubber outsoles give traction on all kinds of terrain. Hi-Tec Oakhurst Waterproof Hiking Boots for kids have rustproof metal hardware. Closeout.
short_description: Kids can go from family hikes in the woods to playing in the park with ease in the Hi-Tec Oakhurst Waterproof Hiking Boots. Real nubuck leather keeps puddles out and toe bumpers add protection.
